INSERT INTO CLASS ( CL_NO ,USER_NO ,CL_CATEGORY ,CL_TITLE ,CL_SUBTITLE ,CL_INFO ,CL_CURRI ,CL_PRICE ,CL_ENROLLDATE ,CL_GRANT ,CL_THUMBNAILPATH
) VALUES ( SEQ_CL.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,default ,default ,? )
SELECT CL_NO ,CL_CATEGORY ,CL_TITLE ,CL_ENROLLDATE ,CL_GRANT FROM CLASS WHERE USER_NO = ?
select count(vod_no) vod_count from vod where cl_no = ?
insert into vod values( SEQ_VOD.nextval, ?, ?, ?, default, default )

SELECT MT_QUE_NO,
QUE_TITLE, QUE_CONTENT, QUE_ENROLLDATE,
ANS_NO, ANS_CONTENT, ANS_DATE
FROM MT_QUE WHERE USER_NO = ?
select v.*, c.cl_title from vod v join class c on v.cl_no = c.cl_no where v.cl_no = ?

select l.*, u.user_name, m.mt_company, c.clcg_name from lecturer l join userinfo u on l.user_no = u.user_no join mentor m on l.user_no = m.user_no join cl_category c on m.clcg_no = c.clcg_no where l.user_no = ?
